TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBinder extends System.Object

summary.span: 支援快速應用程式開發 (RAD) 設計工具產生和剖析資料繫結運算式語法。

span.span: Provides support for rapid application development (RAD) designers to generate and parse data-binding expression syntax.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用多載的靜態ASP.NET 網頁中的資料繫結語法中的這個類別的方法。You can use the overloaded static method of this class in data-binding syntax in an ASP.NET Web page. 這會提供比標準的資料繫結使用的簡單語法。This provides an easier syntax to work with than standard data binding. 不過，因為`DataBinder.Eval`提供自動類型轉換可能會導致效能變慢。However, because `DataBinder.Eval` provides automatic type conversion, it can result in slower performance. 如需有關 ASP.NET 資料繫結、 運算式和語法的詳細資訊，請參閱[繫結至資料庫](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742)和[資料繫結運算式概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a)。For more information about ASP.NET data binding, expressions, and syntax, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742) and [Data-Binding Expressions Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/14cdd57d-0f82-4667-b503-73e1a96f136a). 從.NET Framework 4.5 開始，您可以使用模型繫結來簡化一些您必須透過資料繫結，在舊版本中執行的工作。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117). ## Examples 下列範例會使用靜態方法來填入的欄位控制使用的`Product`物件。The following example uses the static method to populate the fields of a control using an of `Product` objects. 方法無法套用相同的語法，但是它會執行的速度一樣快。The method could be applied with the same syntax, but it would not perform as quickly. 這個範例會使用自訂`Product`類別會公開字串`Model`屬性和數值`UnitPrice`屬性。This example uses a custom `Product` class which exposes a string `Model` property and a numeric `UnitPrice` property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是自訂`Product`類別。The following code is the custom `Product` class. 此程式碼應該包含在 App_Code 目錄中，例如 Product.cs 或 Product.vb 個別的類別檔案中。This code should be included in a separate class file in the App_Code directory, such as Product.cs or Product.vb. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/CS/App_Code/Product.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataBinder/VB/App_Code/Product.vb#2)]

Public Sub New ()

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Shared Property EnableCaching As Boolean

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指出是否在執行階段啟用資料快取。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data caching is enabled at run time.

value.span: 如果啟用 類別的快取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if caching is enabled for the class; otherwise, .

summary.span: 使用反映在 Run Time 時針對物件剖析並評估資料繫結運算式。

span.span: Uses reflection to parse and evaluate a data-binding expression against an object at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 4.5 開始，您可以使用模型繫結來簡化一些您必須透過資料繫結，在舊版本中執行的工作。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Eval (object container, string expression);
.method public static hidebysig object Eval(object container, string expression) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, expression As String) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ expression);

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的物件參考。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 這在網頁的指定語言中必須是有效的物件識別項。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: expression
param.span: 瀏覽路徑，從 容器 物件到要放置在繫結控制項屬性中的公用屬性值。

span.span: The navigation path from the container object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.span: 它必須是以句號分隔的屬性或欄位名稱的字串，例如 C# 中的 Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price 或 Visual Basic 中的 Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price。

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

summary.span: 在執行階段評估資料繫結運算式。

span.span: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time.

returns.span: 執行個體，從資料繫結運算式的評估產生。

span.span: An instance that results from the evaluation of the data-binding expression.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`expression`參數必須評估為公用屬性。The value of the `expression` parameter must evaluate to a public property. 快速應用程式開發 (RAD) 設計工具，例如 Visual Studio 中建立資料繫結時，會自動呼叫這個方法。This method is automatically called when you create data bindings in a rapid application development (RAD) designer such as Visual Studio. 您可以也使用它以宣告方式簡化轉型為文字字串。You can also use it declaratively to simplify casting to a text string. 若要這樣做，您使用`<%# %>`運算式語法，因為使用標準 ASP.NET 資料繫結。To do so, you use the `<%# %>` expression syntax, as used in standard ASP.NET data binding. 資料繫結至範本清單中的控制項時，這個方法會特別有用的。This method is particularly useful when binding data to controls that are in a templated list. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會執行晚期繫結評估，因為使用反映在執行階段，它可能會導致效能顯著降低相較於標準 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法。Because this method performs late-bound evaluation, using reflection at run time, it can cause performance to noticeably slow compared to standard ASP.NET data-binding syntax. 清單的任何 Web 控制項，例如， ， ，或，`container`應該`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果您要繫結 頁面上，針對`container`應該`Page`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`. 從.NET Framework 4.5 開始，您可以使用模型繫結來簡化一些您必須透過資料繫結，在舊版本中執行的工作。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117). ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用`Eval`資料繫結至方法控制項。The following examples show how to use the `Eval` method to bind data to control. 它需要名為 Product 的資料類別。It requires a data class named Product. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/product.vb#1)] 程式碼後置檔案載入測試資料，並將該資料繫結控制項。The code-behind file loads test data and binds that data to a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts.aspx.vb#2)] 中的宣告式語法控制項，您使用方法`Container.DataItem`如`container`參數。In the declarative syntax for the control, you use the method with `Container.DataItem` for the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts3.aspx#3)] 或者，您可以呼叫`Eval`函式，並不包含`container`參數。Or, you can call `Eval` function and not include the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts4.aspx#4)]

exception.span: 為 ，或在修剪後為空字串。

span.span: is or is an empty string after trimming.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Eval (object container, string expression, string format);
.method public static hidebysig string Eval(object container, string expression, string format) cil managed
Public Shared Function Eval (container As Object, expression As String, format As String) As String
public: static System::String ^ Eval(System::Object ^ container, System::String ^ expression, System::String ^ format);

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的物件參考。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 這在網頁的指定語言中必須是有效的物件識別項。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: expression
param.span: 瀏覽路徑，從 容器 物件到要放置在繫結控制項屬性中的公用屬性值。

span.span: The navigation path from the container object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property.

param.span: 它必須是以句號分隔的屬性或欄位名稱的字串，例如 C# 中的 Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price 或 Visual Basic 中的 Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price。

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

param.name: format
param.span: .NET Framework 格式字串 (如同 所使用的字串)，會將資料繫結運算式傳回的 執行個體轉換成 物件。

span.span: A .NET Framework format string (like those used by ) that converts the instance returned by the data-binding expression to a object.

summary.span: 在執行階段評估資料繫結運算式，並將結果格式化為字串。

span.span: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time and formats the result as a string.

returns.span: 物件，是評估資料繫結運算式並將它轉換成字串類型的結果。

span.span: A object that results from evaluating the data-binding expression and converting it to a string type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`expression`必須評估為公用屬性。The value of `expression` must evaluate to a public property. 如需.NET Framework 中的格式字串的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about format strings in the .NET Framework, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 快速應用程式開發 (RAD) 設計工具，例如 Visual Studio 中建立資料繫結時，會自動呼叫這個方法。This method is automatically called when you create data bindings in a rapid application development (RAD) designer such as Visual Studio. 您也可以使用它以宣告方式將所產生的資料繫結運算式的。You can also use it declaratively to convert the resulting from the data-binding expression to a . 若要以宣告方式使用的方法，使用`<%# %>`運算式語法，因為使用標準 ASP.NET 資料繫結。To use the method declaratively, use the `<%# %>` expression syntax, as used in standard ASP.NET data binding. 資料繫結至範本清單中的控制項時，這個方法會特別有用的。This method is particularly useful when binding data to controls that are in a templated list. > [!NOTE] > 這個方法會執行晚期繫結評估，因為使用反映在執行階段，它可能會導致效能顯著降低相較於標準 ASP.NET 資料繫結語法。Because this method performs late-bound evaluation, using reflection at run time, it can cause performance to noticeably slow compared to standard ASP.NET data-binding syntax. 特別是當格式化字串就不需要謹慎，使用這個方法。Use this method judiciously, particularly when string formatting is not required. 清單的任何 Web 控制項，例如， ， ，或，`container`應該`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果您要繫結 頁面上，針對`container`應該`Page`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`. 從.NET Framework 4.5 開始，您可以使用模型繫結來簡化一些您必須透過資料繫結，在舊版本中執行的工作。Starting in .NET Framework 4.5, you can use model binding to simplify some of the tasks that you had to perform through data-binding in earlier versions. 在模型繫結中使用 Web Form 的教學課程系列，請參閱[模型繫結和 Web Form](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117). ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何使用`Eval`資料繫結至方法控制項。The following examples show how to use the `Eval` method to bind data to control. 它需要名為 Product 的資料類別。It requires a data class named Product. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/product.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/product.vb#1)] 程式碼後置檔案載入測試資料，並將該資料繫結控制項。The code-behind file loads test data and binds that data to a control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts.aspx.vb#2)] 中的宣告式語法控制項，您使用方法`Container.DataItem`如`container`參數。In the declarative syntax for the control, you use the method with `Container.DataItem` for the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts3.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts3.aspx#3)] 或者，您可以呼叫`Eval`函式，並不包含`container`參數。Or, you can call `Eval` function and not include the `container` parameter. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/cs/showproducts4.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.ui.databinder.eval/vb/showproducts4.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 擷取物件的已宣告資料項目。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item.

Public Shared Function GetDataItem (container As Object) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetDataItem(System::Object ^ container);

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的物件參考。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 這在網頁的指定語言中必須是有效的物件識別項。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

summary.span: 擷取物件的已宣告資料項目。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item.

returns.span: 物件，表示容器的已宣告資料項目。

span.span: An object that represents the container's declared data item.

returns.span: 如果找不到任何資料項目或容器評估成 ，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if no data item is found or if the container evaluates to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法，略過其`foundDataItem`參數時傳回的結果。This method calls the method, ignoring its `foundDataItem` parameter when returning the result. 中有兩種識別的物件資料的項目。An object's data item is identified in one of two ways. 如果容器物件實作介面，屬性會識別資料的項目，並傳回其值。If the container object implements the interface, the property identifies the data item, and its value is returned. 否則，方法會嘗試解決並傳回名為"M"的容器屬性。Otherwise, the method attempts to resolve and return a container property named "DataItem".

MemberSignature.Value: public static object GetDataItem (object container, out bool foundDataItem);

Public Shared Function GetDataItem (container As Object, ByRef foundDataItem As Boolean) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ GetDataItem(System::Object ^ container, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % foundDataItem);

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的物件參考。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

param.span: 這在網頁的指定語言中必須是有效的物件識別項。

span.span: This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

param.name: foundDataItem
param.span: 布林值，指出資料項目是否成功解析並傳回。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the data item was successfully resolved and returned.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 擷取物件的已宣告資料項目，指出其為成功或失敗。

span.span: Retrieves an object's declared data item, indicating success or failure.

returns.span: 物件，表示容器的已宣告資料項目。

span.span: An object that represents the container's declared data item.

returns.span: 如果找不到任何資料項目或容器評估成 ，則傳回 。

span.span: Returns if no data item is found or if the container evaluates to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的資料的項目會識別兩種方式。An object's data item is identified two ways. 如果容器物件實作介面，屬性識別資料項目，而且會傳回。If the container object implements the interface, the property identifies the data item, and is returned. 否則，方法會嘗試解決並傳回名為"M"的容器屬性。Otherwise, the method attempts to resolve and return a container property named "DataItem".

span.span: Retrieves the value of an indexed property.

span.span: This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`expr`必須評估為公用屬性。The value of `expr` must evaluate to a public property. 清單的任何 Web 控制項，例如， ， ，或，`container`應該`Container.DataItem`。For any of the list Web controls, such as , , , or , `container` should be `Container.DataItem`. 如果您要繫結 頁面上，針對`container`應該`Page`。If you are binding against the page, `container` should be `Page`.

param.name: container
param.span: 運算式所據以評估的物件參考。

span.span: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated.

summary.span: 擷取指定之容器的指定屬性值，然後格式化結果。

span.span: Retrieves the value of the specified property for the specified container, and then formats the results.

returns.span: 具有由 所指定格式的指定屬性值。

span.span: The value of the specified property in the format specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會叫用方法，然後再使用方法，以將結果格式化為指定在`format`參數。The method invokes the method, and then uses the method to format the result as specified in the `format` parameter. .NET Framework 格式字串 (例如所使用的) 將轉換所要的資料繫結運算式傳回的執行個體物件。A .NET Framework format string (like those used by ) converts the instance returned by the data-binding expression to a object. ，會擲回的例外狀況方法套用到以及方法。Exceptions that are thrown for the method apply to the method as well. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法以宣告方式來繫結至索引的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method declaratively to bind to an indexed value. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataBinder.Eval Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataBinder.Eval Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataBinder.Eval Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataBinder.Eval Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#2)]

span.span: Retrieves the value of a property.
